age of wonders 4 is a fantastic blend of 4x strategy and tactical battles the factioncreation system is a standout  mixing forms cultures and tomes of magic lets you craft truly unique empires every run battles feel punchy and strategic citybuilding is satisfying and the realm options keep campaigns fresh its polished pretty and endlessly replayable its easy to recommend to anyone who loves thoughtful strategy and its one of the best 4x strategy games ever made
